content: That's really fascinating! I'd love to know more about the editing process in both films. How did the editors use pacing, transitions, and other techniques to create a sense of tension and emotional resonance? By the way, I was part of a team that wrote, shot, and edited a short film in just 48 hours at the Austin Film Festival, and I was amazed by how quickly we had to make decisions and work together to bring our vision to life.
